pageProduct.name: Andalou Argan Oil + C Natural Glow 3 in 1 Treatment 56ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex and vitamin C blended with organic argan oil, rich in omega 3-6-9 fatty acids and vitamin E, provide a potent portfolio to deeply nourish and condition skin and hair.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Skin & Hair Oil For Normal & Combination Skin Types

Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Argania Spinsosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Oil*, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil*, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil*, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil*, Fruit Stem Cells (Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Tocopherol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Bisabolol, Isosorbide Dicaprylate, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract*, Citrus Aurantium (Petitgrain) Flower Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Flower Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

Daily. 1. Apply small drops to face and neck for natural glow. 2. Rub between hands and smooth through hair to protect and condition. 3. Nourishing for elbows, nails and cuticles.
